updated_cases.title:
For the Altos disabled tenant,Verify that we are not displaying following category in following places
1.Inline Policies->Categories
2.Settings->Bypass category
updated_cases.custom_summary:
For the Altos disabled tenant,Verify that we are not displaying following category in following places
Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud
Security Risk-Spam Sites
Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites
Security Risk

1.Inline Policies->Categories
2.Settings->Bypass category
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1.Login to Tenant WebUI
2.Under the Policies,Click on Inline 
3.Click on New Policy, Verify whether we are getting category name
updated_cases.custom_expected:
We should not get followin Category here
Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud
Security Risk-Spam Sites
Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites
Security Risk

updated_cases.title: Verify that following Categories are present as Main Category but not as source_category_name in /opt/ns/pop/NSKP-<Stack_Name>/cfg/web_category.json file
updated_cases.custom_summary:
Verify that following Categories are present as Main Category but not as source_category_name in /opt/ns/pop/NSKP-<Stack_Name>/cfg/web_category.json file
Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud
Security Risk-Spam Sites
Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites
Security Risk
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1.Login to DP Machine
2.cd /opt/ns/pop/NSKP-<Stack_Name>/cfg/web_category.json 
3.Look for the mentioned Category name in the file
4.Verify following Category Mentioned in "web_category_name" 
Ad Fraud, Botnet,Command and Control Centers,Compromised & Links To Malware,Hacking  ,Malware Call-Home ,Malware Distribution Point ,Phishing/Fraud,Spam URLs ,Spyware & Questionable Software ,C&C Server ,Attack ,Phishing,Malicious Site ,Bot,Phish Site,Spam
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Following Category should be present and metioned in "web_category_name" key
Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud
Security Risk-Spam Sites
Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites
Security Risk
